doc:
Peter Cookson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Cookson 0 Peter Cookson (May 8, 1913 – January 6, 1990) was a stage and film actor of the 1940s and 1950s. He was known for his collaborations with his wife, Beatrice Straight the actress and member of the Whitney family. Peter_Cookson ( May_8_,_1913 – January_6_,_1990 ) was a_stage_and_film_actor of the_1940s_and_1950s . He was_known for his_collaborations with his_wife , Beatrice_Straight the_actress_and_member of the_Whitney_family .
